p: Cyclophosphamide is an alkylating agent used for cancer management. 29 It is broadly used for the treatment of leukemias, lymphomas, multiple myeloma, rheumatic arthritis and prior to bone marrow transplantation. 30 Despite its wide array of clinical applications, cyclophosphamide can cause multiple organ toxicity, including nephrotoxicity, cardiotoxicity, hepatotoxicity and reproductive toxicity. 28, 31
